product_name: Slime Self-Sealing Smart Superthick Presta Tube - 26 x 1.75 - 2.125
long_description: Avoid the inconvenience of a flat with this prefilled SLIME thick-walled tube. Tubes filled with specially formulated Slime product seals instantly when tube is punctured or pinched. Especially thick tube material enhances puncture protection. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Avoid the inconvenience of a flat with this prefilled SLIME thick-walled tube.
